SnapshotOraclev11g.name: v_std_ranking
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery: SELECT school_code, batch_no, class_code, stream_code, section_code, term_code, student_id, min_mark, max_mark, total_score, overall_status, percentage, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY school_code, batch_no, class_code, stream_code, term_code ORDER BY overall_status DESC, percentage DESC NULLS LAST ) AS ranking FROM ( SELECT arc.school_code, arc.batch_no# AS batch_no, arc.class_code, arc.stream_code, arc.section_code, arc.term_code, arc.student_id, SUM(nvl(arc.max_main, 0)) + SUM(nvl(arc.max_internal, 0)) AS max_mark, SUM(nvl(arc.min_main, 0)) + SUM(nvl(arc.min_internal, 0)) AS min_mark, round(SUM(nvl(arc.score_main, 0)) + SUM(nvl(arc.score_internal, 0))) AS total_score, sop.overall_status, round((SUM(nvl(arc.score_main, 0)) + SUM(nvl(arc.score_internal, 0))) /(SUM(nvl(arc.max_main, 0)) + SUM(nvl(arc.max_internal, 0))) * 100, 0) AS percentage FROM arc_std_score arc INNER JOIN mv_std_overall_passed sop ON ( sop.school_code = arc.school_code AND sop.batch_no = arc.batch_no# AND sop.class_code = arc.class_code AND sop.stream_code = arc.stream_code AND sop.term_code = arc.term_code AND sop.student_id = arc.student_id ) WHERE arc.ranking_type = 'YES' GROUP BY arc.school_code, arc.batch_no#, arc.class_code, arc.stream_code, arc.section_code, arc.term_code, arc.student_id, sop.overall_status ) ORDER BY school_code, batch_no, class_code, stream_code, section_code, term_code, ranking, student_id, min_mark, max_mark, total_score, overall_status, percentage
